name: Get Psyched
description:
Take care of your spiritual hygiene by avoiding bullshit and keeping focused on the real shit. How much joy will you get out of your life?

Manual

- Use your mouse to move
- Avoid green blocks; if you contaminate your soul too much, you will die
- Collect yellow blocks to gain bonus score; 2 yellow blocks in a row purifies you

Credits

- Developed by Sumppi
- Music by myuu https://soundcloud.com/myuu
- Assets from Pixabay and Publicdomainvectors
- Tools: Unity, Visual Studio, Audacity, Photoshop

Kattila Game Jam 2020
